start:
I can help you to manage your SNS telegram subscriptions. I use AWS https endpoints under the hood. After you generate an endpoint, just add it to you SNS topics, and I'll do the rest.
Check details in {{link 'https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sns/latest/dg/sns-tutorial-create-subscribe-endpoint-to-topic.html' 'official manual'}}.
View source code in Github

Currently, I support the next commands:
/url - generate endpoint for subscription
babCommand: Wrong command, use /help to get me better
